alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 9:11PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: A northwesterly wind is pushing moisture upslope from the Oregon Lower Columbia Basin into the Blue Mountain Foothills of Oregon, causing dense fog to develop again. This fog is mainly in the Rieth Ridge area between Stanfield and Pendleton. Visibilities are down to a quarter mile over Rieth Ridge along Interstate 84, and at the Pendleton Airport. This fog has about a 60-80% chance of clearing out later this evening as drier air moves into the area for a while. Persons traveling along Interstate 84 and other local roadways are urged to use caution while this dense fog persists for a while longer.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
